The movie was somewhat good. Only Vivek comedy scenes were good in the movie. Songs and BGM in the movie was also not good. The movie has usual story with no twists and turns.
Funny,romantic and brilliant screenplay.This movie is a must watch if you don't understand why fans go gaga for Powerstar PawanKalyan.
